content.text: Today I helped a lady that had very serious stomach issues. She suffered from very painfull stomachaches at night that woulnÂ´t let her sleep. She is a very anxious woman, she worries too much about almost everything and she doesnÂ´t eat very healthy because of her job, she says. After listening to her I realized her health problems come more from her lifestyle and her anxiety. I told her, she should drink tea instead of coffee, and that she should get more rest even if this is during the day. I also told her that she shouldnÂ´t take peopleÂ´s opinions to the heart, that would bring her more calm. I advised her she should get vacation more often and also that she should find a hobby that she really enjoys and do it to clarify her mind and stop worrying about things she just shouldnÂ´t. I hope she listens to me so she can have a more calmed life
